 what religion do you belong to
  Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote: One question.  Are you saying my religion is stupid,
or that fights over religion are stupid?

--- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote:
> Welcome back. ^____^
> 
> Yah, anything related to earth religions, that isn't
> IC (an nothing 
> religious should be metioned when talking about BW
> anyway) shouldn't 
> be said. I don't want to start a fight about
> religion or anything... 
> those are the most stupid things ever, so no more
> comments about 
> religion please. =)
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > I know I shouldn't evangilize on the net, but I'll
> > just say it.  First, of all God should be
> capitalized.
> >  And second of all it's one of the 10 commandments
> NOT
> > to use the lords name in vain, and yes that
> includes
> > "thank God".
> >

> back

> later.
